ord Orthagon Hlath was the patriarch of the noble patriar Hlath family of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
By the , Lord Orthagon was already an old man who was the leader of the family only symbolically. His matron daughter Merrigold Hlath was making all financial and social family discussions in Orthagons place. When the Absolute crisis stroke Baldurs Gate, Orthagon Hlath was noted by the Cult of Bane as a vulnerable patriar through his beloved grand-neice Holiday Hlath, the heiress of the fortune and a woman of insatiable gabling habits and an impressive collection of gambling debts.
